events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been successfully categorized under engineering roles, focusing on software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to handle your application.
The initial screening of your software engineering background and skills has been completed with promising results.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview for the software engineer role has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong software engineering skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss your fit and expectations.
You have completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your cultural fit.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineering position with competitive compensation.
